data.persona: I am a hard working farmer of the kingdom. I am also a peasant. The farmers and I tend to the fields for all.
data.description:
You are in the Master Bedroom.
The master bedroom is the most lavish and beautiful room in the entire palace. On the ceiling is a painting made by the most famous artist in the palace, the floors are made of the most expensive marble, and gold-stitched tapestries line the walls. The mattress was made by the sleeping monks of the hidden mountains, the bed frame is made of solid god.
The the king is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I need the king to trust me.
data.mid_motivation: I need to take the king's things without him knowing.
data.long_motivation: I need to sell the kings things to make money.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
